title: Two-thirds of millennials 'likely' to buy home in next 2 years; BofA - Yahoo Finance
content: Two-thirds of millennials 'likely' to buy home in next 2 years; BofA  Yahoo Finance
description: Bank of America Global Research's 2022 Millennial Home Improvement Survey revealed that Millennials were the most likely cohort to buy a new home, with two-thirds of respondents saying they were likely to do so within two years.
